div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1725 Alexandria ("Rivaye d'Alexan- (33) dria"), 1904? Burial: 30 B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: 900 AR Ptolemy XII Auletes and/or Cleopatra VII: tetradr. Disposition: unknown Edd√©, Boll. di Num. 1905, pp. 129, 140 (no details but presumably the series Svoronos 1815-40 is meant)
